attributes.action: Not stop operation ‘Scorpion’ trained police officers from doing their jobs.
attributes.additional_details: Tougher tactics have led to 36% fall in thefts involving mopeds in London
attributes.background:
This will continue to gain control of our streets from moped gangs. We also hope that motorbike thefts will be reduce as we all shops being robbed and people being mugged. 

It’s the moped riders choice to hurt and rob people
